reuters.title: RENAULT <RENA.PA> YR ENDED DEC 31 1986
reuters.body: Consolidated net loss 5.54 billion francs vs loss 10.93 billion. Consolidated net turnover 131.06 billion francs vs 122.14 billion. Consolidated debt 54.3 billion francs vs 61.9 billion. Net loss car making 4.14 billion francs vs loss 10.99 billion. Net loss industrial vehicles 990 mln vs loss 1.54 billion. Note - The company said the consolidated net loss was after costs and provisions for restructuring of 3.90 billion francs, which includes exceptional items arising from the planned sale of its stake in American Motors Corp <AMO> to Chrysler Corp <C>. Full company name is Regie Nationale des Usines Renault. Reuter 
